comments.raw_text: Especially when uploading new patches I tend to resize the comment textarea because it's way too small. When I now reload the page or restart the browser all form data is restored but the textarea shrinks back to its original size. Restoring the textarea dimensions in such cases would be nice to have.
comments.creator: ttaubert@mozilla.com
